attributes.action: suspend for the moment the obligation to take annuity by age of 75 ,while further reviewing the situation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the present economic credit crunch,it is most unfair to make anyone take an annuity from their private pension fund at 75,as per current legislation,since it may condemn them to relative poverty for the rest of their days.
